name: No School No Rules
description:
Immerse yourself in the full cycle of life of the most severe school in Russia! No School No Rules will tell you the story of a Russian schoolboy Ivan who is on the verge of graduation and dropping out of school. But he has his own plans ... He intends to finish school in his own way and, along the way, take revenge on all teachers and local hooligans.

Make your way from a simple schoolboy to the main solver, sweeping away everyone in your path. It's time not to leave anyone a chance! Fight, steal, and fight your way to the top of the school hierarchy to put everyone in their place at the end!

CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED IN THE GAME:



■ First floor of the school, partly second floor, gym

■ Two characters

■ One mission

■ Dialogue with NPCs

■ Multiplayer

■ The ability to fight

NOT IMPLEMENTED, IN DEVELOPMENT:



STORY LINE AND INTERACTIVE DIALOGUES

Go through an exciting storyline with different endings. Lots of off-story missions and assignments. A well-thought-out system of dialogues, you yourself choose what to answer. All your decisions affect the world and environment in the game.

BUILT-IN COOPERATIVE MODE

Separate multiplayer mode with your friends! Hire a team of 20 and wreck the school? Or smash the windows of the classroom of the nastiest teacher with the whole raid at night, and then run away from the guards? What if you sneak into school at night, change your grades in the magazine and arrange a couple of surprises for the next morning? Only your imagination decides!

PUMP SKILLS OF YOUR CHARACTER

Complete storyline or secondary tasks, get experience points for them and distribute them among the branches of opportunities. Powerful punches and tricks, or stealth and theft? Create your own unique character up to a versatile stealth fighter!

■ Hand-to-hand combat - to learn new techniques and inflict more serious injuries on your opponents.

■ Stealth - for invisible penetration, breaking office doors and pickpocketing.

■ Eloquence - persuade, intimidate, bribe, find new allies and eliminate opponents not only by force.

FULL FREEDOM OF ACTION

Only you decide what to do now! Attend or skip classes, start massive fights or complete missions. Immerse yourself in the full life cycle of a Russian school!
